name: The Last Sacrifice: Blood King's Desire
storyline: You are born as the “Moon’s Beloved Child” that all vampires crave and are fascinated by. According to the old covenant, you are destined to becoming a sacrifice for the Vampire King. One night, he takes you to his room where you’re alone together. Lying on the bed, you prepare yourself to have your blood sucked – however what you ultimately feel is not pain, but pleasure.
summary: The first in The Last Sacrifice series.
